title: Missing Ward Skins?
body:
Not sure if anybody else is having this issue, but ever since the latest patch some of my ward skins have just disappeared from selection.
I'm pretty sure it's only two, Gingerbread and Year of the Horse, but they've just vanished entirely.

Is there a reason for this I don't know about?

replies.body: To the best of my knowledge there is a visual bug atm that is preventing some ward skins from showing in the client. They are still attached to your account, so you haven't lost them, you just can't select them. They're working on a fix for it :)
